about.heading: ABOUT
about.description:
As a passionate developer, I aspire to grow as a Software Developer or DevOps Engineer. With strong experience in Go (Golang), TypeScript, Python, and C#, I excel at building robust, scalable, and automated software solutions.

My journey spans diverse industries â€” logistics, navigation, cybersecurity, and technology â€” where I've honed my expertise in microservices, CI/CD pipelines, database management, and process automation.

Driven by curiosity and a relentless desire to learn, I'm particularly interested in automation and workflow optimization. I enjoy contributing to open-source projects, exploring new technologies, and pushing the boundaries of what software development and DevOps engineering can achieve.
about.buttonText: Let's connect and build something amazing together!

career.heading: Career
career.SAGE.title: Software Automation Engineer
career.SAGE.description: Automated CI/CD pipelines, scripting with Python, Powershell, Groovy, Go, streamline releases and deployments to AWS, containerized services with Docker and Kubernetes, managed infrastructure as code with Terraform, maintained MySQL databases, delivered Power BI reports
career.ACC.title: Full Stack Developer
career.ACC.description: Developed front/back with React, Next.js, Node.js, FastAPI; managed GraphQL microservices; optimized CI/CD on Azure DevOps; delivered quality with Jest and PostgreSQL.
career.HORNET.title: QA Engineer
career.HORNET.description: Tested e2e with Cypress, APIs with Postman, integrated CI on GitLab, implemented Semantic Release, developed TypeScript/Node.js endpoints and Go script for CI cleanup.
career.BAR.title: Bartender
career.VGROUP.title: Assistant Captain
career.VGROUP.description: Sailed in 20+ countries, managed navigation/crew, supervised loading, developed skills in maritime regulations and emergency management.
